name: LAHARA
description: Laharaâ€™s token supports decentralized finance, travel, and clean energy by enabling secure transactions, staking rewards, and community governance. It facilitates seamless payments within luxury hospitality and eco-friendly travel services, incentivizes user engagement through staking and rewards, and allows token holders to vote on key decisions. By partnering across hospitality and tech sectors, Lahara integrates blockchain for real-world utility, ensuring transparency and fostering an engaged community committed to sustainable innovation.
